channel.title: Subscribers on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Subscribers on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:-75 Chances: Comcast’s (CMCSA) fourth-quarter earnings reflect a continued strength in wireless subscribers, offset by a declining broadband subscriber base. The company also added around 3 million subscribers to its streaming platform Peacock, a 50% year-over-year gain. Risks: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Comcast (CMCSA) give a sense of how the business performed, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
